title: Hangman

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will force all of players voting the person with the most votes to retract those votes; you will then prevent that player from being voted for the rest of the day.
- If you attempt to cancel a lynch on a Town, Neutral Evil or Neutral Benign role, the lynch will not occur and night will happen immediately.
- If the target is not Town or Neutral Evil/Benign, both you and the lynch target will die.
- You may cancel two lynches.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
"[Hangman's Name] tried to defend this scum! They could be teammates, so they both have been hanged!" (Failed Action Message)
"Irrefutable evidence has been found proving [Lynch Target]'s innocence! He will now be pardoned." (Successful Action Message)

desc:
Post 186
*Your hands shake with indecision. All those among you live or die by your one word, or lack of it.*
Conversion Immune
